title: Datadog
description: A cloud monitoring and security platform that provides full-stack observability, with features for infrastructure, application performance, and log management.

title: New Relic
description: An all-in-one observability platform that helps engineers monitor, debug, and improve their entire stack, from the front end to the back end.

title: Dynatrace
description: An AI-powered observability platform that provides end-to-end visibility and automation for modern multi-cloud environments.

title: Prometheus
description: A leading open-source monitoring system and time series database, designed for the cloud-native world.

title: Grafana
description: An open-source analytics and visualization platform that allows you to create, explore, and share interactive dashboards from a variety of data sources.

title: Azure Monitor
description: A comprehensive monitoring solution for collecting, analyzing, and responding to monitoring data from your cloud and on-premises environments within Microsoft Azure.

title: AWS CloudWatch
description: An AWS service that provides monitoring and observability for your cloud resources and applications on AWS, on premises, and on other clouds.
